title: UPSTREAM: Solving Problems Before They Happen
description: We knew a pandemic was coming. We knew our police were treating some of us differently than others. So why were we so unprepared for what happened? In this eye-opening conversation, Rufus and author Dan Heath dig into what it takes to root out problems at their source, both in our own lives and in the larger world.

itunes:author: Next Big Idea Club
